user.title: Connect to Home.InfoPoint
user.description: Enter school URL, username and password. Example URL: https://homeinfopoint.de/schoolname/

subjects.title: Name subjects (and optionally link WebUntis)
subjects.description:
Provide friendly names for detected subjects. Optionally set a WebUntis lessons calendar and per-subject match patterns (regex OR with `|`).

Field hints: `map_<key>` (e.g. `map_de`) = display name; `match_<key>` = title match for WebUntis; `webuntis_lessons_calendar` = calendar entity id (e.g. `calendar.myname_webuntis_calendar`).

init.title: Options: Subjects & WebUntis
init.description: Adjust subject display names (`map_<key>`), optional match patterns (`match_<key>`), and the WebUntis lessons calendar (`webuntis_lessons_calendar`).
